LanguageData.DetonatorTable_detonate_desc: Detonates all armed remote explosives on the same channel in range.
LanguageData.RemoteExplosive_arm_desc: When armed, this explosive can be remotely detonated.
LanguageData.RemoteExplosive_detonatorChannelChanger_: Sets the channel of the detonator. Only explosives on the same channel can be detonated.
LanguageData.RemoteExplosive_autoReplace_desc: If enabled, this explosive will be automatically re-placed after being detonated.
LanguageData.DetonatorTable_component_desc: Install a component to allow detonating explosives on different channels.
LanguageData.BillsTab_MaterialButton_tooltip: Sets the base material that new bills are created with.
LanguageData.FoamWall_death_message: {0} died in a solidifying foam wall.
LanguageData.PortableDetonator_detonate_desc: Detonates all armed explosives in range on the white channel.
LanguageData.PortableDetonator_broke_msg: The Portable Detonator ran out of battery power.
LanguageData.Detonator_notargets: Cannot detonate- no armed explosives in range on this channel.
LanguageData.DetonatorManual_detonate_desc: Detonates all explosives connected to the same detonator cord.
LanguageData.Cord_dry_desc: Calls a colonist to dry this cord section to prevent failures when it is used.
LanguageData.Alert_cordFailure_desc: A detonator cord failed due to being wet and burned out.
LanguageData.CordDesignator_desc: Selects only Detonator Cord placed in an area. Useful for maintenance and deconstruction. Hold Shift to add to current selection.
